Find A Doctor (JDWNRH) Find A Doctor
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer

Menu String Resources --> Notification Login Send Feedback Share App Rate App About Help Related Apps Communicate More
Anesthesiology Community Health> Dental Dermatology Emergency ENT Forensic General OPD Gynaecology Medical Ophthalmology Orthopaedic Pathology Pediatrics Pharmacy Psychiatry Radiology Surgical
Contact Us Tap the button to make a Call
Enter Your Feedback Here Your Feedback is Anonymous. You can provide feedback for the hospital, as well as app.
Find A Doctor App This Android App Find A Doctor is to check the availability of doctors in Jigme Dorji Wangchuck National Referral Hospital. This App provides platform to avail the services facilitated by doctors and theiravailability in the hospital if users have installed this app. The users can search the doctors using the search button by their name or their department. The notification feature will keep the users up to date with the information about the hospital, be it outbreak of diseases or any network services failure.
User Manual This button helps user to search the doctor through their name or by their specialization.
Doctors need to enter their credentials to update their status. This feature provides information and alert the users about the latest outbreak of diseases and updates the important messages.
This feature contain list of options such as Login,About us,Help,Feedback,Rate us,Share app and More Apps. This feature provides user manual for the app users to guide them when they encounter with the problems. This section of setting is to suggest the users to share app to social media if it is found very useful and productive.
This section of the setting is to make users know more about the App and their functionality. This feature provides the platform for users to comments and give feedback for the betterment of the App. This section is to rate the App according to the services facilitated by the App to the users. Back Help feature Next Setting feature Share App This provides an Admin and doctors to enter their credentials to update their status. Hospital Image Login feature
